text:
@FlowConFR @holly_cummins @CloudNativeFdn 🌩️  Going #cloud-native, 5⃣ tips to avoid most common pitfalls:
—Identify the main pain point.
—Align on a clarified goal.
—Look at the whole system.
—Ensure psychological safety.
—Optimize feedback.

Very good talk by @holly_cummins at #flowcon, thank you.
